titles.title: Providing for corrections in the enrollment of the bill (H.R. 1854) making appropriations for the Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1996, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H8545)

Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on House Oversight, and Standards of Official Conduct, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Standards of Official Conduct
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

bill.summary: 09/06/1995--Introduced. Makes corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 1854 (legislative branch appropriations) to add provisions concerning lobbying disclosure and congressional gift rules.
